Curam Client Infrastructure
API Specification

Packages 
Package Description
curam.client.util.convert  
curam.common.util.xml.dom
This package contains the Document Object Model (DOM) which provides a means of working with XML documents.
curam.common.util.xml.dom.filter
This package contains the classes for filtering content in the Document Object Model (DOM).
curam.common.util.xml.dom.input
This package contains the classes for reading XML documents via SAX and DOM.
curam.common.util.xml.dom.output
This package contains the classes for outputting XML documents via SAX and DOM.
curam.common.util.xml.dom.transform
This package contains the classes for implementing DOM-specific transformations.
curam.common.util.xml.dom.xpath
This package contains the classes for working with XPath searches in the Document Object Model (DOM).
curam.omega3.request
Contains functionality that allows the processing of requests made to the web client.
curam.omega3.texthelper
Contains functionality to allow management of conversion of application data to the text formats displayed on the HTML pages and the parsing of text format data entered by users on HTML form pages back into the required type of application data.
curam.omega3.user
Contains functionality that allows the capture of user specific state such as user preferences.
curam.omega3.util
This package contains general usage utility functions for client specific code.
curam.util.cache
This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam Cache service.
curam.util.cache.exception
This package contains exceptions raised by the Curam Cache service.
curam.util.client
Contains the Client Infrastructure.
curam.util.client.bopi
Allows the client infrastructure presentation layer to access a business operation implemented in the application server.
curam.util.client.domain
Domain-related processing classes for the client infrastructure, most of which can be overridden to perform custom processing.
curam.util.client.domain.compare
Contains functionality that allows the comparison of homogeneous values when sorting and therefore controls the sort order of the data displayed on list pages.
curam.util.client.domain.convert
Contains functionality that allows the conversion of data from the application server into the string format displayed on the web page and parses the string format entered by the user to the type required by the application server.
curam.util.client.domain.defaults
Provides default values when no other values are available.
curam.util.client.domain.marshal
Contains functionality that allows the assembly of data that was split over several form fields by a renderer plug-in into a single value that can be submitted to the application server after parsing by the converter.
curam.util.client.domain.render
Contains abstract interfaces for the three types of renderer, namely edit, select and view.
curam.util.client.domain.render.edit
Contains an abstract base class for all renderers that are used to render form controls for the editing or creation of data.
curam.util.client.domain.render.select
Contains an abstract base class for all renderers that are used to render form controls for the selection of data.
curam.util.client.domain.render.view
Contains an abstract base class for all renderers that are used to render form controls for the viewing of data.
curam.util.client.domain.util  
curam.util.client.model
Contains the view architecture of the client.
curam.util.client.path.resolver  
curam.util.client.path.util
This package supports the main prefix paths used for the data sources accessed by the client infrastructure.
curam.util.client.plugin
This package contains an exception class specific to the client application.
curam.util.client.tab
This package contains a utility API for accessing client configuration information.
curam.util.client.view
Contains the View architecture of the Client Infrastructure.
curam.util.common
This package contains commonly used client exceptions.
curam.util.common.domain
Provides support for domain plug-ins that includes simple life-cycle management and supports a shared, thread-local plug-in context.
curam.util.common.message
Contains base for utility classes that can handle the insertion of argument values into message strings.
curam.util.common.message.generated
This package contains generated client exceptions.
curam.util.common.path
Provides the base for path resolver plug-ins.
curam.util.common.plugin
Provides base for all plug-ins including life-cycle management and support for configuration and a shared, thread-local plug-in context.
curam.util.common.util
Contains various utility classes to support the plug-in framework.
curam.util.configuration  
curam.util.dom.html2  
curam.util.jmx
This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam JMX service.
curam.util.jmx.extpoints
This package contains classes used in the JMX instrumentation of application extension points.
curam.util.jmx.mbean
This package contains useful classes for building custom MBeans.
curam.util.resources
This package contains various utility classes.
curam.util.trace
This package contains classes and interfaces used in application tracing.
curam.util.webservices
This package contains classes and interfaces used for dealing with web services.
